## Checklist

- [ ] Lesson follows the [template structure](../../docs/templates/lesson-template.md)
- [ ] All required metadata fields are included
- [ ] Learning objectives are clear and specific
- [ ] Content is accurate and tested (if technical)
- [ ] Examples are relevant and working
- [ ] Exercises are progressive in difficulty
- [ ] Self-assessment questions are included
- [ ] Markdown syntax is valid
- [ ] All links and references work
